title: Send Notification Event Schema
description: Message sent to the send notification topic, Notification Service will consume these messages.

referenceId.description: Reference ID from the initiating service, most likely a UUID but not required to be.

userId.description: The user being notified. For patients this is udp_id. For providers in the future TBD.

address.description: email, phone number, or device id, depending on the notificationType

notificationType.description: Type of notification to send to the above address.

notificationBody.description: Body of the message to send.
